trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that defines security settings at the service level.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目，定義服務層級的安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of authorization policy types.
trans-unit.target: 取得授權原則型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthorizationPolicyTypeElementCollection" /> that contains a collection of authorization policy types.
trans-unit.target: 包含授權原則型別之集合的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthorizationPolicyTypeElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Configuring a set of authorization policy implementations enables transformation of one set of input claims into another set of claims.
trans-unit.target: 設定一組授權原則實作 (Implementation) 可讓一組輸入宣告轉換成另一組宣告。

trans-unit.source: Access control can be granted or denied based on the claims.
trans-unit.target: 可以根據宣告來授與或拒絕存取控制。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this behavior configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得此行為組態項目的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 行為類型。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of a specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之組態項目的內容複製到這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether all the operations in the service impersonate the caller.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指定服務中所有作業是否都模擬呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all the operations in the service impersonate the caller; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務中所有作業都模擬呼叫端，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a specific service operation impersonates the caller, the thread context is switched to the caller context before executing the specified service.
trans-unit.target: 當特定服務作業模擬呼叫端時，執行緒內容會在執行指定的服務之前切換為呼叫端內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement" /> impersonates on serializing reply.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement" /> 是否在序列化回覆時模擬。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement" /> impersonates on serializing reply; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement" /> 會在序列化回覆時模擬，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the principal used to carry out operations on the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於在伺服器上執行作業的原則。

trans-unit.source: A valid <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode" /> value that specifies the principal used to carry out operations on the server.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode" /> 值，指定用於在伺服器上執行作業的原則。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode.UseWindowsGroups" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Description.PrincipalPermissionMode.UseWindowsGroups" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the role provider, which provides role information for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定角色提供者的名稱，它會提供 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 應用程式的角色資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider.
trans-unit.target: 角色提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Different types of role providers can be used to provide role information from a Windows group, an SQL database, an authorization manager policy store, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 不同類型的角色提供者可用來透過 Windows 群組、 SQL 資料庫，授權管理員原則存放區，以及其他提供角色資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of service authorization manager used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所使用的服務授權管理員的型別。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the type of the service authorization manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定服務授權管理員型別的字串。
